channel.title: Cockiness Of Some People
channel.description:
Well, cocky people are really something that grind my gears. Rather than directly insulting them and just dragging something on that's not wanted, I thought we could harmlessly, as a whole, show them being cocky and showing off doesn't really do anything but piss people off. A good example of this is TimeTM, as just about EVERY one of his posts show his over-obsession with himself and his work. I'm not just trashing you in public TimeTM, but you're just a great example of a true cocky person.
The purpose of this is to make them realize showing off doesn't make them look cool, or get them any extra respect. In fact, it actually hurts their reputation but they are too blind and ignorant to see it.
So what are your views on it? Be sure to vote [size=3pt]Option 2[/size]!

item.title: Cockiness Of Some People
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:20, topic:332788”]OH THE IRONY[/quote]You clearly don’t know what a cocky person is.

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:19, topic:332788”]damn it LIN just yesterday you had me say how you were not a complete faggot and you go and make this thread…[/quote]You really need to get your head out of your ass, as it seems the only respect you give people is by their work.

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:12, topic:332788”][quote author=Frell link=topic=429218.msg3151466#msg3151466 date=1268578565]
Lin has been here for 3x as long as most of you guys so he deserves to do it. Hes been here before and after Moparscape got fucked over.
[/quote]
That doesn’t excuse anyone, Ive been on this planet for 20 years, That gives me permission to go shout abuse at a 12 year old?
“i’ve been here longer than you it doesn’t matter if shout at you”[/quote]You’re 20 years old and as retarded as you are? That’s sad.

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:332788”]Lin has been here for 3x as long as most of you guys so he deserves to do it. Hes been here before and after Moparscape got fucked over.[/quote]Anyone could post this topic. I don’t see why this has to do with permissions…

A lot of the people who posted on here really need to do some research on the kind of people I’m talking about, as it appears many of you don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Cockiness Of Some People
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:23, topic:332788”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=429218.msg3151597#msg3151597 date=1268586080]
Why would you make this thread just curious?

Trust me just because you call someone cocky, doesn’t mean they will stop
[/quote]

The purpose of this is to make them realize showing off doesn’t make them look cool, or get them any extra respect. In fact, it actually hurts their reputation but they are too blind and ignorant to see it.

80% of the cocky people are just yesmen, following someone who’s brave enough to be an asshole in the beginning. This thread for example: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429239.0.html

It’s irritating to see the same fucking post over and over again “We don’t care”, just report the thread. If you don’t care that he’s leaving then why do you have to mediate it across the whole forum? I for one am going to miss our homosexual minority, because at least he was honest. Everyone else in the community is playing the roll of the typical “kid behind a screen”.

If you’re not exceedingly inclined in whatever it is you’re talking about, don’t intend to make people think you are. Chances are, there is someone that knows more about it than you, and you’re just setting yourself up to look like an idiot. You’re ability to sustain against criticism isn’t anything to be proud of either. If someone says they don’t like your work, or that there’s a flaw in it, take it for advice. Don’t lash back and flaunt your skills (or lack of for that matter) in order to prove yourself otherwise.

Cockiness is rather a retardation in this community, as it isn’t even fulfilled. I could understand someone being cocky and honest, but most of the users that are cocky are lying most of the time.[/quote]<3
I r cocky.

cocky.jpg450×624

Personally I despise people that toot their own horn, or whine when other people don’t appreciate their work. “WHY DIDN’T I WIN THE SCYTHE COMPETITION??? MINE WAS SO MUCH BETTER” - MistaBigBoss

Unfortunately the winner caved in and gave MBB his reward, just so he would shut up.

Read full topic

item.title: Cockiness Of Some People
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:21, topic:332788”]Why would you make this thread just curious?

Trust me just because you call someone cocky, doesn’t mean they will stop :P[/quote]

Lin:

The purpose of this is to make them realize showing off doesn’t make them look cool, or get them any extra respect. In fact, it actually hurts their reputation but they are too blind and ignorant to see it.

80% of the cocky people are just yesmen, following someone who’s brave enough to be an asshole in the beginning. This thread for example: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429239.0.html

It’s irritating to see the same fucking post over and over again “We don’t care”, just report the thread. If you don’t care that he’s leaving then why do you have to mediate it across the whole forum? I for one am going to miss our homosexual minority, because at least he was honest. Everyone else in the community is playing the roll of the typical “kid behind a screen”.

If you’re not exceedingly inclined in whatever it is you’re talking about, don’t intend to make people think you are. Chances are, there is someone that knows more about it than you, and you’re just setting yourself up to look like an idiot. You’re ability to sustain against criticism isn’t anything to be proud of either. If someone says they don’t like your work, or that there’s a flaw in it, take it for advice. Don’t lash back and flaunt your skills (or lack of for that matter) in order to prove yourself otherwise.

Cockiness is rather a retardation in this community, as it isn’t even fulfilled. I could understand someone being cocky and honest, but most of the users that are cocky are lying most of the time.

Read full topic
